member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Configuration.EnvironmentalOverrides.ConfigurationMerger
member.summary: Component used to create an environment specific configuration file, using a Delta Configuration (*.dconfig) file and a base configuration file.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Configuration.EnvironmentalOverrides.ConfigurationMerger.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of .
member.param: The path to the main configuration file, which should be used to create the environment specific configuration file.
The path to the delta configuration file (*.dconfig) that contains the environment specific configuration.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of .
member.param: The path to the main configuration file, which should be used to create the environment specific configuration file.
The instance that contains the environment specific configuration.

member.summary: Creates the environment specific configuration file.
member.param: The path to the file which should be used to store the environment specific configuration.
